property.name: objectDescription
property.value: Detailed information about a single LUI to Person Relation. This is used to link together a learning unit instance and a person in such widely defined domains as a student registering in a course or an instructor being assigned to advise students in a particular program.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Lui Id

property.name: summary
property.value: Unique identifier for a Learning Unit Instance (LUI).

property.name: label
property.value: LUI Id

property.name: description
property.value: Unique identifier for a Learning Unit Instance (LUI).

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Person Id

property.name: summary
property.value: Unique identifier for a person record.

property.name: label
property.value: Person Id

property.name: description
property.value: Unique identifier for a person record.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Result Values Group Keys

property.name: summary
property.value:
The keys of the result values groups to be applied to this LPR
For example, setting the grading option to pass/fail or the credits to 3 for this course.

property.name: label
property.value: Result Values Group Keys

property.name: elementLabel
property.value: Result Values Group Key

property.name: description
property.value:
The keys of the result values groups to be applied to this LPR
For example, setting the grading option to pass/fail or the credits to 3 for this course.

property.name: shortLabel
property.value: Commitment Percent

property.name: summary
property.value:
Commitment percentage for the person in the LUI
Valid range should be between 0 and 100.00 inclusive.

property.name: label
property.value: Commitment Percent

property.name: description
property.value:
Commitment percentage for the person in the LUI
Valid range should be between 0 and 100.00 inclusive.

property.name: summary
property.value: Create and last update info for the structure.

property.name: description
property.value:
Create and last update info for the structure. This is optional and treated as read only since the data is set by the internals of the service during maintenance operations.
Contains audit trail information about the creation and last update of this object Also contains the version ind used for optimistic locking.
Attempts to set or update should result in a ReadOnlyException being thrown.

property.name: objectDescription

Contains audit trail information about the creation and last update of this object Also contains the version ind used for optimistic locking.
Attempts to set or update should result in a ReadOnlyException being thrown.
